string.value: You should visit #b#p1002001##k, who gave you a helping hand last time.

#b#p1002001##k wants to see how much more powerful you've become and tests you to find out.

#t04000024# #b#c04000024#/80#k
#t04000020# #b#c04000020#/100#k
You were able to emphatically prove to #b#p1002001##k that you've gotten much stronger since the last time you met.

#b#h0#!#k It's been a long time! How's the journey going for you? It gives me a great sense of pride to see you all grown up like this! I actually want to give you a test to see how powerful you've become. Humor me?
Alright, I want you to gather #b80 #t04000024#s#k and #b100 #t04000020#s#k. If you can do it, I'll acknowledge you as a formidable adventurer.
You don't seem confident in your abilities. Must be a bad day. When you're feeling better, talk to me.
Wow, amazing! I can't believe you're done already! You have indeed become much more powerful than even I anticipated.
Did you receive the money I gave you? It should be enough for you to travel to a few new places. Best of luck to you.
Hmmmâ€¦you're still short on those items? Did I overestimate your abilities? Nah. Get me #b80 #t04000024#s#k and #b100 #t04000020#s#k. I know you can do this with ease.
